name: Rona (Jamie)
description:
Obviously the world is locked down at the moment, and it's a uniquely difficult situation for everybody. It's important to find joy in the little things even in the worst of times, so I thought why not make a game where you get to shoot Coronavirus in the face with a vaccine.

It's just a bit of fun, don't take it too seriously. Just enjoy and try and get a high score.

Made using Unity and some 3D assets from TurboSquid.
